ðŸ“– Summary: bpytop is a resource monitor written in Python that displays usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network, and processes. It offers an easy-to-use, game-inspired menu system with full mouse support and a responsive UI. It is a Python port and continuation of bashtop.
